solution_line_template: He filled {num_basketball_boxes} - {fewer_football_boxes} = <<{num_basketball_boxes}-{fewer_football_boxes}={num_football_boxes}>>{num_football_boxes} plastic boxes with football cards.
So, he has {num_football_boxes} x {cards_per_football_box} = <<{num_football_boxes}*{cards_per_football_box}={total_football_cards}>>{total_football_cards} football cards.
Therefore, Dexter has {total_basketball_cards} + {total_football_cards} = <<{total_basketball_cards}+{total_football_cards}={total_cards}>>{total_cards} cards in total.
